quotes.quote: If your thighs touch, you're closer to being a mermaid.
Be a mermaid and make waves.
Rainbows and mermaids are proof that imagination and beauty go hand in hand.
When mermaids sleep in oceans deep inside their coral caves, they lay their hweads on seaweed beds, rocked softly by the waves.
Write your secrets in the sand and trust them with a mermaid.
A mermaid has not an immortal soul, nor can she obtain one unless she wins the love of a human being. On the power of another hangs her eternal destiny.
Be a mermaid. Swim fast, wear a crown, and dream big.
Dive deep for the treasure that you seek.
But a mermaid has no tears, and therefore she suffers so much more.
Always be yourself. Unless you can be a mermaid. Then always be a mermaid.
Mermaids don't lose sleep over the opinions of shrimp.
She is a mermaid on dry land and the world is her ocean.
She is a mermaid but approach her with caution. Her mind swims at a depth most would drown in.
If you sing to the mermaids, they come when you're drowning.
Mermaid, a water woman who chooses imagination over fear.
